questions.question: What are the visual elements that should be included in the login button?
questions.context: Understanding UI requirements for proper story decomposition

questions.question: What are the expected user interactions with the login button?
questions.context: Understanding user interaction requirements for proper story decomposition

questions.context: Understanding business logic requirements for proper story decomposition

epics.title: Design and Development of Login Button
epics.description: This epic involves the design and development of the login button. The button should be visually appealing and responsive to user interactions.
epics.business_value: A well-designed and functional login button is essential for user authentication. It provides the first step in user engagement and experience on the platform.
acceptance_criteria: The login button should be visible and accessible on the login page
The login button should trigger the authentication process when clicked

epics.title: Integration of Login Button with Authentication API
epics.description: This epic involves the integration of the login button with the authentication API. The button should trigger the appropriate API calls for user authentication.
epics.business_value: Integration with the authentication API ensures that the login button functions correctly and securely, providing a seamless user experience.
acceptance_criteria: The login button should trigger the correct API calls when clicked
The authentication process should be executed successfully
dependencies: Design and Development of Login Button
